content: I think Obama should be given a fair opportunity to provide the positive changes he has promised to attempt. But, he should also settle this citizenship issue and quiet the dissension over the matter. On the other hand, I am truly concerned, that if for some reason, he were removed from office...there would be chaos resulting in riots, looting and civil disobedience in numerous major US cities with possible strong racial overtones.
